name: guardthelife-frontend
description: GuardtheLife platform - React Web + Swift iOS

scripts.ios:build: cd ios && xcodebuild -project GuardtheLife.xcodeproj -scheme GuardtheLife -configuration Debug
scripts.ios:build:release: cd ios && xcodebuild -project GuardtheLife.xcodeproj -scheme GuardtheLife -configuration Release
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../ios && echo 'iOS project ready for Xcode' && cd ../shared && npm install
